4309280.name: Caravan Village: Farming Life
4309280.description:
You poured your life savings into that glossy brochure promising a "luxury caravan village," expecting a life of leisure. But reality hit hard: the realtor ran off with the cash, leaving you with nothing but a rusted, weed-choked wasteland. Yet, this tragic end is actually the beginning of your new life. Armed with just a suitcase and your grandmother’s legendary recipe book, you set out to start from scratch.

Can you learn to live off the land and turn this scrapyard into a thriving sanctuary? It won't be easy. The land is neglected, the locals are wary, and the pages of your grandma's cookbook are missing. But the valley seems full of opportunity. With a little dedication, some creativity, and plenty of delicious food, you might just be the one to restore Caravan Village to greatness!

Features

Turn a Junkyard into Paradise. Transform your overgrown field into a lively farm and hotel! Clear away the rusted metal, till the soil, plant your seeds, and establish your own layout. You have plenty of space and freedom to create the warm atmosphere of your dreams.

Restore and Manage 8 Unique Caravans. This isn't just your home; it's a sanctuary for your guests. Discover 8 different abandoned caravans scattered across the land. Repair them, furnish them with care, and turn each one into a unique luxury suite. Happy guests mean a thriving town!

A Flavorful Journey from Farm to Table. A true chef knows their ingredients! Milk your cows, collect fresh morning eggs from the coop, and grow vegetables according to the season. Step into the kitchen with your own fresh produce and prepare unforgettable feasts for your guests.

Improve Your Skills Over Time. As you make your way from a struggling novice to a master proprietor, you'll level up in 5 different areas: Farming, Mining, Cooking, Socializing, and Crafting. As you progress, you'll learn new recipes, unlock more efficient tools, and customize your skills to fit your playstyle.

Become Part of the Local Community. You are not alone in this cozy town! Meet the unique characters living nearby, listen to their stories, and build friendships. Gift them your homegrown produce and listen to their troubles. In return, they will offer you not just friendship, but the missing pages of your grandmother’s lost cookbook.

Explore the Depths of the Mines. The dark caves await! As you travel deeper underground, you'll encounter not just valuable gemstones and ores, but mysteries of the past. To upgrade your tools and expand your business, you must be brave and dig deep.

Customize Your Living Space. With hundreds of decorative items, furniture, and plant options, redesign both your own home and the guest caravans from top to bottom. Express your style and make Caravan Village truly unique.

Enjoy the Nature. When the work gets overwhelming, take a break. Relax by fishing in the lake, hunt for rare mushrooms in the forest, or simply watch the sunset. This place exists not just for work, but for living.
